channel.title: Version 6.2 :: Hugo Relearn Theme
channel.description: 6.2.0 (2024-08-26) Enhancements [feature][change] anchor: add option to scroll into view #886 [feature] theme: support for GitHub styled alerts #885 Fixes [bug] arrownav: avoid rude event handling for form elements #887 Maintenance [task] 404: move styles to separate file #889
